Windlord::

Windlord had the feeling that Emapth needed a friend, he found her 
quarters and with a low voice he said "Emapth!!! Are you here?"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" 
<cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Emapth::
> 
> Still mostly absorbed in her own thoughts, Empath swallows her 
pride 
> and reaches out with a tiny mental impulse, trying to draw Windlord 
> to her by implanting the suggestion that she could use a friend in 
> her room with her right about now.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000 <airly2002@h...>" 
> <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord::
> > 
> > 
> > Windlord Walked towards the large corritors, looking for Aerotaur 
> or 
> > Empath. "Is anyone here?"said aloud the male
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" 
> > <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Well, it was Airly's idea for Windlord and Empath to get 
> > > together in the first place.  I'm not having it on my head for 
> her 
> > to 
> > > miss out on the perfect opportunity to solidify that bond.
> > > 
> > > Closing her mind to all else in the world, Empath takes the 
Soul 
> > Orb 
> > > from her subspace compartment and sets it on the table in front 
> of 
> > > her.  It calls to her briefly, then she shuts that out as well 
> and 
> > > takes out a tiny holo-projector.  When she flicks it on, a six-
> inch-
> > > tall image of a familiar black Seeker greets her.
> > > 
> > > "Skywarp, what do I do?" she asks it, tears welling up in her 
> > > eyes.  "It seems like only yesterday that I saw you for the 
last 
> > > time - and now I'm falling for a Maximal, of all things.  I 
know 
> > it's 
> > > been centuries since you died, but I still feel like I'd be 
> > betraying 
> > > you to admit to Windlord that I ... I ..."
> > > 
> > > The telepathic femme can't finish her own sentence.  Cradling 
the 
> > > projector in her arms, she bows her head and cries quietly.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > > OOC: Subtlety never was your strong suit was it ... oh 
wait ... 
> > > nevermind 
> > > > that I forgot I'm not supposed to be sarcastic.  OOH but I 
> could 
> > > have fun 
> > > > with this.
> > > > 
> > > > ::Aerotaur::
> > > >        His aimless wanderings through the Maximal base had 
> proven 
> > > fruitless.  
> > > > Literally.  There was a severe lack of fruit.  This might've 
> been 
> > > because he 
> > > > never found the mess hall but that thought hadn't occurred to 
> him 
> > > yet.  
> > > > Neither had the fact that he had been walking in circles 
> through 
> > > the crew 
> > > > quarters area for quite some time.  Well, on his umpteenth 
trip 
> > > down one of 
> > > > the halls he happened upon the brooding Empath heading into 
her 
> > > room.  She 
> > > > hadn't seen him of course although she should have sensed 
him.  
> > > Perhaps she 
> > > > was just too distracted he thought to himself.  Regardless he 
> > > turned around 
> > > > and walked the other way searching for more fruit and maybe 
his 
> > > friend too, 
> > > > but only if he wanted fruit.
